synopsis.text: Festa in Akihabara' live stream, a special 2-episode anime featuring the band Morfonica is set to air during Summer 2022. As the Morfonica members gear up for a summer vacation filled with concerts, Touko covertly crafts a scheme dubbed the 'Summer Morfonica Plan' with the help of Nanami and Tsukushi. This new anime project promises to bring exciting performances and intriguing plans to the forefront, ensuring a thrilling summer for the Morfonica members and their fans alike.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
